12f15bf9-5cd6-429d-a6f6-03ee3fed3263.description: The training provides data analysts with advanced research and analysis tools. Combining methods of big data and quantitative analysis with qualitative research, for the purpose of formulating a situation picture, assessing it, raising recommendations, and supporting the decision-making processes in the organization. The training consists of advanced lessons, wide range of examples, and practical exercises that provide “hands on” experience.
